toast.title: Toast Notifications
toast.desc: Control whether to show toasts on state updates or command events.

state_change.title: State Change Toast
state_change.desc: Show toast on every state topic update.

command.title: Command Sent Toast
command.desc: Show toast when sending command packets.

log_sharing.title: Log & Data Sharing
log_sharing.desc: Send anonymized logs and packets (1000) to the developer for troubleshooting.

latency.title: Packet Processing Latency Analysis
latency.desc:
Measures the time it takes for a generated virtual packet to pass through the processing pipeline (Receive -> Parser -> Automation -> Command Generation).
Data is not sent to the actual serial port. (100 iterations)

packet_log.title: Packet Log (RX/TX)
packet_log.desc: List of parsed received packets and packets sent by H2M.

raw_log.title: Raw Packet Log
raw_log.desc: List of raw packets received from RS485 devices with intervals.
raw_log.empty: Start logging to view real-time raw packets.
